attributes.action: Make mp's pay for the commission into expenses and not the tax payer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Are we the taxpayer expected to pay for the commission into the mess that MP's have created themselves ?  The total end cost of the commission should be paid for by MP's, perhaps by way of a deduction from future salary increases ?

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
